attributes.action: call civil partnerships a marriage and not just a civil ceremony by law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to have our Civil Partnerships known as a "marriage" and not just a Civil Ceremony. We would like to be able to put this on our status and not just civil ceremony, we want the same rights and to be able to get married in a Church and have the same rights as every single man and woman getting married and being called "husband and wife" instead we will be either "husband and husband" or "wife and wife". We are humans after all, we all live, breathe, laugh and cry the same as everyone else does, we should not be discriminated just for not wanting to be with someone of the opposite sex.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
